events.name: Sustainable Circular Supply Chain for EV Batteries
events.wd_label: Sustainable Circular Supply Chain for EV Batteries
events.wd_description: Designing and developing a sustainable circular supply chain for EV lithium-ion battery recycling and production involves complex assessments of environmental sustainability and economic viability using IoT and big data.
events.description: Designing and developing a sustainable circular supply chain for EV lithium-ion battery recycling and production involves complex assessments of environmental sustainability and economic viability using IoT and big data.

events.name: supply chain design
events.wd_description: The design of a green Closed-Loop Supply Chain (CLSC) network includes reverse and forward flows, incorporating sustainability and economic considerations.
events.description: The design of a green Closed-Loop Supply Chain (CLSC) network includes reverse and forward flows, incorporating sustainability and economic considerations.

events.name: optimization model
events.wd_description: A bi-objective mixed-integer linear programming (MILP) model is developed to design the supply chain, minimize costs and CO2 emissions, and utilize IoT to enhance performance.
events.description: A bi-objective mixed-integer linear programming (MILP) model is developed to design the supply chain, minimize costs and CO2 emissions, and utilize IoT to enhance performance.

events.name: validation
events.wd_description: The proposed model is validated using expert knowledge and data from a large manufacturer of EV lithium-ion batteries, employing a simulation algorithm for data generation.
events.description: The proposed model is validated using expert knowledge and data from a large manufacturer of EV lithium-ion batteries, employing a simulation algorithm for data generation.

events.name: en CLSC network
events.wd_description: The network includes both reverse and forward flows to optimize economic and environmental outcomes.
events.description: The network includes both reverse and forward flows to optimize economic and environmental outcomes.

events.name: objective MILP model
events.wd_description: The MILP model addresses both economic and environmental objectives, minimizing costs and negative environmental effects.
events.description: The MILP model addresses both economic and environmental objectives, minimizing costs and negative environmental effects.

events.name: and big data
events.wd_description: The use of IoT and big data enhances network performance and creates a traceable and secure environment.
events.description: The use of IoT and big data enhances network performance and creates a traceable and secure environment.

events.name: zy multi-objective method
events.wd_description: A fuzzy multi-objective method is used to solve the bi-objective optimization model under uncertainty.
events.description: A fuzzy multi-objective method is used to solve the bi-objective optimization model under uncertainty.

events.name: ulation algorithm
events.wd_description: A simulation algorithm is used to examine the effectiveness of the proposed model through simulated problems.
events.description: A simulation algorithm is used to examine the effectiveness of the proposed model through simulated problems.

events.name: ion Technology case study
events.wd_description: Expert knowledge and data from Lition Technology are used to validate the proposed model, despite security and data availability constraints.
events.description: Expert knowledge and data from Lition Technology are used to validate the proposed model, despite security and data availability constraints.

events.name: ulation process
events.wd_description: A simulation process generates data based on real-world approximations to validate the model.
events.description: A simulation process generates data based on real-world approximations to validate the model.
